synopsis.text: Shibai's enigmatic masked Storyteller returns, captivating eager children with chilling tales inspired by Japan's darkest urban legends and rumors. In this fourth season, the storyteller weaves narratives of a salaryman haunted after burying a dead cat, a college student uncovering a gruesome secret in her new apartment, adventurous boys stumbling upon a mysterious fish tank in an abandoned house, a man finding himself in unexpected danger on a wrong bus, and a young couple's amusement park visit turning sinister. These haunting tales and more await in the uniquely animated kamishibai series, Yami Shibai 4. (Source: Assistant)
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
